author: craigmcc
msg: Update the struts-chain implementation to actually use the [chain] module,
and update it to use the latest CatalogFactory capabilities.  If you want
to try this out, you'll need to update to the latest (20041018 or later)

author: chirino
msg: Updated to use new activemq jars.  jgroups dependency not needed.

author: crossley
